roleset.name: cover with planks
roleset.note: PLANK-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles: feather (9.9), fry (45.3) (from plank.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: All arguments
example.text: They planked the floor with second-hand lumber in an effort to finish the job quickly.
example.arg: in an effort to finish the job quickly

example.name: Passive, descriptive
example.text: [The walls]-1 were planked *-1 with different shapes and sizes of wood.
example.arg: with different shapes and sizes of wood

roleset.name: to broil and serve on a plank
roleset.note: PLANK-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles: feather (9.9), fry (45.3) (from plank.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: Transitive, fish
example.text: Had the weather been warmer, I could have planked the fish and thrown it on the grill, but I opted for the Conventional Hot-Box instead.

example.name: With description of plank
example.text: I planked the salmon on an Alder board I acquired in Seattle, then rubbed the filet with Spanish extra virgin olive oil.
example.arg: on an Alder board I acquired in Seattle
